verses.plain: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;

tokens.t: I charge
therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;

verses.plain: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

tokens.t: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

verses.plain: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;

tokens.t: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;

verses.plain: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.

tokens.t: And they shall turn away
ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.

verses.plain: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.

tokens.t: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.

verses.plain: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

tokens.t: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

verses.plain: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:

tokens.t: I have fought a good fight, I have finished
course, I have kept the faith:

verses.plain: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

tokens.t: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

verses.plain: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:

tokens.t: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:

verses.plain: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

tokens.t: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

verses.plain: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.

tokens.t: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.

verses.plain: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.

tokens.t: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.

verses.plain: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.

tokens.t: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring
, and the books,
especially the parchments.

verses.plain: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:

tokens.t: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:

verses.plain: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.

tokens.t: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.

verses.plain: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.

tokens.t: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all
forsook me:
that it may not be laid to their charge.

verses.plain: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

tokens.t: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and
all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

verses.plain: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

tokens.t: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve
unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom
glory for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.plain: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.

tokens.t: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.

verses.plain: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.

tokens.t: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.

verses.plain: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.

tokens.t: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.

verses.plain: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.

tokens.t: The Lord Jesus Christ
with thy spirit. Grace
with you. Amen.
